title: Ep 109: Christian is a  Polyglot
description:
Go to Function of Beauty now to take your Hair Goals Quiz and save 25% on your first order.

In This Episode: Erika starts the episode out with a listener telling us about the red flags their father gives, then a woman wants to know if they are an asshole for embarrassing their father in law by asking him to explain his unfunny joke, next a pregnant wife leaves the party after her husband makes the worst toast possible, and a listener wants to know if they are the asshole for not inviting their senile grandma to her baby shower. And for this week's Circle Jerdge Christian teaches everyone a bunch of new words in different languages.

Get Judgies Merch Here:
https://www.bonfire.com/store/the-judgies-podcast/

Intro Music by: Iván
